Author: BoofDatKratom247
Text: I was looking up tips on acid reflux and found this post. The only thing that I’ve found to help me is keeping a lot of water nearby. When the feeling starts creeping up I just gulp down water and it like pushes it down or whatever. Not very helpful but it’s the only way I know of
